timeline.message:
fix code to support ng9
also render in tempate module with providers

timeline.bodyText:
Looks like the purpose of this flag is to drive adding a generic param to the ModuleWithProviders (as in angular 9 the default value for param (any) has been removed). It doesn't affect whether the module with providers is generated or not. Is that correct?
If so, perhaps a better name would be "ENFORCE_GENERIC_MODULE_WITH_PROVIDERS" or smth like that?
Or maybe even remove it from the java class, and just do conditionally in the template (based on ngVersion)?
timeline.author: amakhrov

replies.bodyText: rename is fine. concerning the template condition, I think this is a bit difficult with the mustache template, so I think the current solution is fine.
replies.author: macjohnny
